title: IHCL announces signing two new hotels in Dhaka
description: The first mixed-use development project in Dhaka with the two hotels is located at Gulshan, a key business hub in the city and would be at a short driving distance from the Shahjalal International airport. The 230 room Taj and the 130 room Vivanta hotels will feature all day diners and bars and in addition, the Taj will feature two speciality restaurants, a roof top bar and a Deli for on- the- go meals.
